alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 21 at 7:20PM CST until January 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Above Philadelphia. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Water begins to affect Burnside Lake Water Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 13 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 13.1 feet just after midnight tonight then remain steady over the weekend. - Flood stage is 13 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pearl River Philadelphi 13.0 13.0 Fri 6 pm CST 13.1 13.1 13.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 730 AM CST.
